SEARCH
Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Network.ToModel

Interface ServerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIServer
public interface ServerInterface extends Remote
Remote interface for the server in a client-server architecture using RMI. Defines methods that the server can expose to clients.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addToClientQueue(ModelMessage msg)
    Adds a model message to the queue for processing by clients.
    void
    addToNetworkManager(ViewMessage msg)
    Adds a view message to the network manager.
    Set<Double>
    getClients()
    Retrieves the set of currently registered client IDs.
    void
    registerClient(double ID, ClientInterface client)
    Registers a client with a unique ID and its corresponding remote interface.
    void
    run()
    Starts the server execution, potentially binding it to a network port.
    void
    unregisterClient(double ID)
    Unregisters a client identified by the given ID.

  • Method Details

    • addToNetworkManager

      void addToNetworkManager(ViewMessage msg) throws RemoteException
      Adds a view message to the network manager.
      Parameters:
      msg - The view message to be added.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs during the method invocation.

    • run

      void run() throws RemoteException, AlreadyBoundException
      Starts the server execution, potentially binding it to a network port.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs during the method invocation.
      AlreadyBoundException - If the server is already bound to the specified network port.

    • registerClient

      void registerClient(double ID, ClientInterface client) throws RemoteException
      Registers a client with a unique ID and its corresponding remote interface.
      Parameters:
      ID - The unique ID of the client.
      client - The remote interface of the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs during the method invocation.

    • unregisterClient

      void unregisterClient(double ID) throws RemoteException
      Unregisters a client identified by the given ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - The unique ID of the client to unregister.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs during the method invocation.

    • addToClientQueue

      void addToClientQueue(ModelMessage msg) throws RemoteException
      Adds a model message to the queue for processing by clients.
      Parameters:
      msg - The model message to be added to the client queue.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs during the method invocation.

    • getClients

      Set<Double> getClients() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the set of currently registered client IDs.
      Returns:
      A set containing the IDs of all registered clients.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a network error occurs during the method invocation.
